nodes.text: Kelsa Beniko was a female Human citizen of the Sith Empire who lived on Dromund Kaas during the Cold War. She was married to Jaren Beniko and the two had a daughter named Lana, who was discovered to be Force-sensitive and was sent to study the dark side of the Force in the Sith Academy on Korriban by the laws of the Sith Empire. She eventually reached great heights in the Empire, becoming the Minister of Sith Intelligence. By 3630 BBY both Kelsa and Jaren were listed in records as deceased.
